title: E! NEWS EXCLUSIVE: 5 Reasons Why Tarek El Moussa Will Overcome His Latest Back Injury

meta_data.description: Tarek El Moussais ready to overcome another injury. On Thursday evening, the Flip or Flop star shared some 'awful news' with his followers on Instagram. As it turns out, the proud father injured his back again. 'Last time I lost 50 pounds and was taking large amounts of pain meds to try and help the pain. Truthfully those meds really affected my mental and physical state and changed who I was. Last time I hurt my back it took me a year and a half to recover. As of today I can barely walk...'
